code: @Override protected RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(RestRequest restRequest, NodeClient client) {     StartILMRequest request = new StartILMRequest().     request.timeout(restRequest.paramAsTime("timeout", request.timeout())).     request.masterNodeTimeout(restRequest.paramAsTime("master_timeout", request.masterNodeTimeout())).     return channel -> client.execute(StartILMAction.INSTANCE, request, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
